issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
according to the documentation here http://docs.appcelerator.com/titanium/latest/#!/api/Titanium.Network-method-encodeURIComponent

encodeURIComponent encodes non-standard characters as specified in the documentation. This cause some decoders to improperly decode the string, specifically when passing the URL to nodejs decodeURI(q)
fields.summary: encoding of URI components are encoding non-standard characters
